entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.6°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
